mapper.update: UPDATE honor_certificate SET certificate_name = #{honorCertificateModifyDto.certificateName}, obtain_time = #{honorCertificateModifyDto.obtainTime}, file_name = #{honorCertificateModifyDto.fileName}, md5_file_name = #{honorCertificateModifyDto.md5FileName}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{honorCertificateModifyDto.id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, certificate_name AS certificateName, obtain_time AS obtainTime, file_name AS fileName, md5_file_name AS md5FileName FROM honor_certificate WHERE uid = #{userId} AND is_delete = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET (#{pageNumber} -1) * #{pageSize}
